work_experiences.description: Full-cycle accounting for residential and commercial real estate portfolios. Property-level financial reporting, service charge and Nebenkosten accounting, monthly and annual closings. Coordination with property and asset managers. Preparation of financial statements and audit support under IFRS and Swiss GAAP FER.
Property portfolio accounting for commercial assets. General ledger, tenant billing, service charge allocations. Abacus and SAP RE-FX for property management accounting.

skills_text: Abacus advanced for Swiss real estate accounting. SAP RE-FX and SAP FI for property and general ledger. Financial reporting and consolidation. Service charge and Nebenkosten accounting for residential and commercial portfolios. IFRS and Swiss GAAP FER. Monthly and annual closing processes. Preparation of financial statements and audit documentation. Excel advanced for financial modelling and reporting.
education_text: Federal Diploma in Accounting (Fachausweis Finanz- und Rechnungswesen). BSc Business Administration with focus on accounting and finance.

work_experiences.description: Accounting for property management portfolios. Tenant accounting, lease administration, service charge calculations. Monthly closings and financial reporting. Coordination with facility and property managers.
Accounts payable and receivable. Support for monthly closing. Basic financial reporting and reconciliation.

skills_text: Yardi advanced for property management and tenant accounting. Excel advanced for financial modelling, pivot tables and reporting. Closing processes and month-end procedures. Tenant and lease accounting. Financial accounting and general ledger. German and English fluent.
education_text: BSc Accounting from a Swiss university. Focus on financial accounting and reporting standards.

work_experiences.description: Portfolio accounting for real estate assets. Financial reporting under IFRS. Coordination with asset management and external auditors.
Group financial accounting and reporting. SAP FI, general ledger, intercompany. IFRS reporting and annual closing.

skills_text: SAP FI for general ledger and financial reporting. IFRS and local GAAP. Portfolio accounting and consolidation. Financial reporting and analysis. Excel for modelling. No direct Nebenkosten or service charge experience; focus on corporate and real estate group reporting.
education_text: MSc Finance. Specialisation in corporate finance and financial reporting.

work_experiences.description: Senior accountant at a real estate investment firm. Full accounting cycle for property investments. Financial statements, audit support, coordination with asset managers. Acting team lead for small accounting team.
General ledger and financial reporting. Support for annual closing and audit.

skills_text: SAP FI for general ledger and financial accounting. Excel advanced for reporting and analysis. Annual closing and audit preparation. Financial statements. Federal Accounting Certificate. Job title is Senior Accountant in real estate context, not specifically Real Estate Accountant or Property Accountant.
education_text: Federal Accounting Certificate (Eidgenössischer Fachausweis). Commercial education and further training in accounting.

work_experiences.description: Financial accounting for a real estate developer. Project accounting, general ledger, financial reporting. No direct property management or service charge accounting; focus on development and group reporting.

skills_text: Abacus for accounting. Financial reporting and closing. General ledger and month-end procedures. BSc Finance. No Yardi, SAP RE-FX or Nebenkosten experience. Industry is real estate development rather than asset management or property management.
education_text: BSc Finance. Focus on corporate finance and accounting.

work_experiences.description: Financial accountant in insurance. General ledger, IFRS reporting, annual closing. No real estate or property accounting experience.

skills_text: SAP for financial accounting. IFRS reporting. Financial reporting and analysis. Strong accounting background but industry is insurance; no real estate, property portfolios or Nebenkosten experience.
education_text: BSc Accounting. Specialisation in financial accounting.

work_experiences.description: Junior role supporting property accountants. Data entry, basic reconciliations, support for month-end. Limited responsibility for closings or financial statements.
Administrative support for accounting team. Filing, invoice processing, basic bookkeeping.

skills_text: Abacus basic user. Excel intermediate. Limited experience with closing processes. Commercial diploma only. Correct domain (property management, real estate) but insufficient seniority and depth for Senior Real Estate Accountant role.
education_text: Commercial Diploma (Kaufmännisches Berufsbildungszeugnis). No university or federal accounting diploma.

work_experiences.description: Accounting manager in retail. Team lead for accounting department. Oversight of financial reporting, closing, audit. Leadership and people management; limited hands-on accounting. No real estate or property accounting.

skills_text: SAP for group accounting. Leadership and team management. Financial reporting and audit coordination. MBA Finance. Strong seniority but wrong industry (retail) and overqualified leadership level; role requires senior individual contributor, not people manager.
education_text: MBA Finance. Focus on leadership and strategic finance.

work_experiences.description: Accounts payable and invoice processing. Vendor management, payment runs, reconciliation. Operational AP focus; no financial reporting, closings or property accounting.

skills_text: Invoice processing and accounts payable. SAP for vendor and payment processing. Creditor management and three-way matching. Commercial training. Too operational and narrow; not financial accounting, reporting or real estate. No experience with property portfolios, IFRS or financial statements.
education_text: Commercial training (Kaufmännische Grundbildung). No degree in accounting or finance.

work_experiences.description: Controller in manufacturing. Budgeting, forecasting, cost analysis, variance analysis. Management reporting and KPI dashboards. No accounting, general ledger, financial statements or real estate. Controlling focus, not accounting.

skills_text: Budgeting and forecasting. Cost analysis and variance analysis. Management reporting and business partnering. BSc Business. Controller role: planning and analysis, not financial accounting. No real estate, property accounting, IFRS, closings or audit. Minimal overlap with Senior Real Estate Accountant.
education_text: BSc Business. Focus on controlling and management accounting, not financial accounting.
